com.oracle.coherence.spring.annotation

Annotation Type ExtractorBinding


  • @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface ExtractorBinding
    Specifies that an annotation type is a ValueExtractor binding type. 
     @Inherited
 @ExtractorBinding
 @Target({TYPE, METHOD, CONSTRUCTOR})
 @Retention(RUNTIME)
 public @interface CustomerNameExtractor {}

    ValueExtractor bindings are intermediate annotations that may be used to associate ValueExtractors with target beans.

    ValueExtractor bindings are used by annotating a ExtractorFactory bean with the binding type annotations. Wherever the same annotation is used at an injection point that requires a ValueExtractor the corresponding factory's ExtractorFactory.create(java.lang.annotation.Annotation) method is called to produce a ValueExtractor instance.

    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Gunnar Hillert
